oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Tribute - Music and Memories of Grandpa Jones - 2013-10-29
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Discussion and performance celebrating the life and career of Louis Marshall Jones aka Grandpa Jones from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on October 19, 2013. Participants include Ramona Riggins Jones; Fred Foster; Charlie McCoy and Doyle Dykes.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Panel discussion hosted by John Rumble; includes selected audio excerpts and audio from video; performances include; Eight More Miles To Louisville (Charlie McCoy with Alisa Jones); Fallen Leaves (Alisa Jones); Mountain Dew (all);
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jones, Ramona; Foster, Fred, 1931-; McCoy, Charlie, 1941-; Dykes, Doyle; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
